name: Shepherd's Purse (Thistledown Short Story)
description:
Play on Firefox if the game doesn't load on your browser. Click in the game window for the "new game" button to appear.

Click or press "Enter" to progress the story.

---

The Kako are cannibals - depraved, mindless beasts to be killed without remorse. Everyone knows this.  Shepherd's Purse, an elder at a Kouneli Outpost, isn't so sure...

This game is set in the world of Thistledown:

https://liquidassets.itch.io/thistledown-a-tragedy-of-blood

Used assets from Build-A-Bunny, my own game asset pack:

https://liquidassets.itch.io/build-a-bunny

Thanks to everyone who contributed to the Thistledown Kickstarter, who helped make this happen, especially Mary, who got us across the line for this short story post-Kickstarter.
